column4: Just installed kubuntu but for some reason already banned form #kubuntu.... anyone here knows how to install themes in kubuntu 10.04? all the tutorials i found have different options available than what i see.
and why did you get banned多多 just download them from http://kde-look.org/ and grab them to you appearence window多多
that's what i do in gnome, no idea how to in kde

no idea. i said i just installed it today so i'd never been to that chan before. but my real question is i've downloaded the plasma theme, but theres no where that says "add new theme" at least not in the latest kubuntu
